s1.name: JORAM manuals
s1.p: If available, the documents related to a given release are identified by the same tag. Example, "Installing the 3.6 release" is what should be read for installing JORAM 3.6.

It may happen that for a given release, no document matches. This means that the document written for the previous release is still up-to-date. Example, "Installing the 3.4 release" is what should be read for installing JORAM 3.5.

It is well known by the JORAM team that this documentation is not sufficient and sometimes vague or unclear. Do not hesitate to provide any comment or feedback that could help us improving the doc. Also, any contribution is welcome.
